page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT-cat & dog kennels
page.content: Near Three Gates Farm are boarding kennels which have been in operation since 1977. The kennels are used by people when they are on holiday, working abroad or ill in hospital. At the busiest time of the year, which is the summer, there are 25-30 animals being looked after. At the time of our visit there were 6 dogs and 3 cats. Animals must be at least 3 months old before they enter the kennels and must have had their injections. One Golden Labrador stayed for two and a half years while the family was abroad. The dogs are kept in indoor kennels and are allowed to use exercise runs and an open paddock on fine days. The owners of the keennels love dogs and train their own champions, German Shepherds and Shippekes (Belgian Barge Dogs).
